name: Voucher Redeemption Report
query:
SELECT
    s.customer                  AS "Customer Name::150",
    c.phone_no                  AS "Contact No",
    c.email_id                  AS "Email ID::150",
    s.discount_amount           AS "Value Of Voucher::150",
    DATE(s.creation)            AS "Voucher Redemption Date::150" ,
    DATE(pr.creation)           AS "Voucher Creation Date::150",
    pr.buy_back_requisition_ref AS "Buy Back Requisition Ref::150",
    coalesce(bb.modified_by,'')              AS "MPO::150",
    coalesce(pr.modified_by,'')              AS "Collection Officer::150",
    coalesce(s.modified_by,'')               AS "Redemption Officer::150",
    s.expiry_date               AS "PIN Expiry::150",
    (
        CASE
            WHEN s.mark_voucher_as_redeemed=1
            THEN 'Redeemed'
            ELSE
                CASE
                    WHEN DATE(now())<s.expiry_date
                    THEN 'Pending'
                    ELSE 'Expired'
                END
        END) AS "Voucher Status::150",
        prt.warehouse       AS "Location::150"
FROM
    `tabSlot Cashier` s
inner join      tabCustomer c on   s.customer=c.name
left join    `tabPurchase Receipt` pr  on pr.pin=s.enter_pin
left join    `tabBuy Back Requisition` bb on bb.name=pr.buy_back_requisition_ref
left join `tabPurchase Receipt Item`  prt on prt.parent=pr.name
